basic.floral_language:
Photinia glabra
Floriography: delicate, innocent, plain.
The photinia is an evergreen shrub or small tree. Leaves are long round oval, edge slightly toothed, red then turning green after mature. Small delicate flowers bloom clustery with great vitality. It has been widely cultivated for garden uses.
This plant grows well in sunny habitat but it is also shade tolerant. It blooms in April to May for one to two weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color white, pink

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, but also tolerates shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
